text.div:
ActivityDefinitionCategory

High-level categorization of the type of activity in a protocol.

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/activity-definition-category defines the following codes:

Code Display Definition
diet Diet To consume food of a specified nature
drug Drug To consume/receive a drug, vaccine or other product
encounter Encounter To meet or communicate with the patient (in-patient, out-patient, phone call, etc.)
observation Observation To capture information about a patient (vitals, labs, diagnostic images, etc.)
procedure Procedure To modify the patient in some way (surgery, physiotherapy, education, counseling, etc.)
supply Supply To provide something to the patient (medication, medical supply, etc.)
other Other Some other form of action

name: ActivityDefinitionCategory
description: High-level categorization of the type of activity in a protocol.

concept.definition: To consume food of a specified nature
To consume/receive a drug, vaccine or other product
To meet or communicate with the patient (in-patient, out-patient, phone call, etc.)
To capture information about a patient (vitals, labs, diagnostic images, etc.)
To modify the patient in some way (surgery, physiotherapy, education, counseling, etc.)
To provide something to the patient (medication, medical supply, etc.)
